More information:
Tomek, Did you install over another version of eclipse?  This many errors in so short a period could mean an install problem ... although not necessarily.

PW
I've downloaded and unpacked the I20070321-1800 into empty folder. Nevertheless I forgot to mention in the previous comment that I managed to get these errors (bug 178782 and bug 178783) only 2 times of out 6. So, I'm not sure is it repeatable enough to become a bug.

I was able to reproduce these failures here at least one time.  It's worth investigating.  I'll post to the bug with more info.
